product_name: Black Diamond Big Air XP Belay Device Package
long_description: Get geared up for climbing with the Black Diamond Big Air XP belay device package. It includes a new ATC-XP belay device and a Mini Pearabiner screwgate carabiner. ATC-XP belay device features high-friction grooves that offer 3 times greater hold and stopping power than regular friction mode. Machined window through the body makes the device 30% lighter than the original version; ATC-XP weighs 64g. Mini Pearabiner screwgate carabiner features a large rope-bearing surface and a keylock nose that won't snag on slings and bolt hangers. Black Diamond Big Air XP belay device package is available in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Get geared up for climbing with the Black Diamond Big Air XP belay device package. It includes a new ATC-XP belay device and a Mini Pearabiner screwgate carabiner.
